rules.name: broadcastToAll
rules.description: Broadcasts all OP messages to everyone

rules.name: cakeAlwaysEat
rules.description: Allows you to always eat cake

rules.name: cameraModeRestoreLocation
rules.description: Restores player location back to original location in survival, similar to the cs script by Kdender
extras: Saves location even after server restart

rules.name: cameraModeSurvivalRestrictions
rules.description: Ports cameraModeSurvivalRestrictions from carpet 1.12 into commandCameraMode
extras: Does not allow you to use /cs if you are in danger

rules.name: cameraModeTeamTeleportBlacklist
rules.description: Prevents players from teleporting to players on specific teams in spectator

rules.name: cameraModeTeleportBlacklist
rules.description: Prevents players from teleporting to players in spectator

rules.name: combinePotionDuration
rules.description: Combines the duration of potions

rules.name: commandBackup
rules.description: Allows you to backup regions in an area to the backups folder in the world folder
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandCameraMode
rules.description: Survival friendly spectator mode, puts the player in and out of spectator mode
extras: Allows for saving location after server reset using rule cameraModeRestoreLocation and adds functionality for cameraModeSurvivalRestrictions
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandDefuse
rules.description: Enables /defuse to be used to stop any tnt from exploding within a given range
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandDimensions
rules.description: Allows the player to teleport to different dimensions with a simple command
extras: It will teleport you to specified location, unless unspecified in which case it will teleport you to 0,0
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandEnderChest
rules.description: Allows you to open your enderchest with /enderchest
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandExtinguish
rules.description: Allows /extinguish to be used to extinguish the player
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandFly
rules.description: Toggles the ability to fly while in survival mode
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandGM
rules.description: Allows /gmc, /gms, /gmsp, and /gma to be used
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandGhostPlayer
rules.description: This allows you to spawn a fake player that doesn't load chunks (They appear on tab list and you are able to teleport to them)
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandGod
rules.description: Can be buggy if used while in creative mode
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandHat
rules.description: Allows you to equip items to your head slot using /hat
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandHeal
rules.description: Allows /heal to be used to heal and feed the player
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandLagSpike
rules.description: Allows you to simulate a lag spike using /lagspike
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandMods
rules.description: Allows you to do /mods, it lists all the mods running on the server
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandMore
rules.description: Allows /more to be used to give a full stack of whatever item the player is holding
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandNear
rules.description: Lists other players near you
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandNightVision
rules.description: Toggles night vision
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandPublicKick
rules.description: Allows anyone to use the /kick command

rules.name: commandPublicOp
rules.description: Allows anyone to use the /op command

rules.name: commandPublicSaveAll
rules.description: Allows all players to use the command /save-all

rules.name: commandPublicScoreboard
rules.description: Allows anyone to use the /scoreboard command

rules.name: commandPublicTeam
rules.description: Allows anyone to use the /team command

rules.name: commandPublicViewDistance
rules.description: Allows all players to change view distance

rules.name: commandRegion
rules.description: Allows you see what region you are in and teleport to a region

rules.name: commandRename
rules.description: Allows you to rename items with a command

rules.name: commandRepair
rules.description: Allows /repair to be used to repair any item the player is holding
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandStrength
rules.description: Toggles strength
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandSwitchDimensions
rules.description: Allows the player to teleport between the nether and overworld at equivalent coords
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandTop
rules.description: Teleports the player up

rules.name: commandWarp
rules.description: Allows players to warp using /setwarp and /warp
extras: You are only able to set one warp which will be removed after server restart
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandWorkbench
rules.description: Allows you to open a crafting table with /workbench
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: editableSigns
rules.description: Allows you to edit a sign after it has been placed by right clicking it while sneaking

rules.name: essentialCarefulBreak
rules.description: Mining blocks while crouching will put mined blocks straight into your inventory
extras: Same as wholmT's implementation in carpetAddons but works with stackable shulkers, requires players to subscribe to carefulbreak

rules.name: essentialCarefulDrop
rules.description: Killing mobs while crouching will put dropped items straight into your inventory
extras: requires players to subscribe to carefuldrop

rules.name: fakePlayerDropInventoryOnKill
rules.description: Automatically drop the fake player inventory on kill

rules.name: gameRuleNonOp
rules.description: Allows non-op players to change Game Rules from the client

rules.name: gameRuleSync
rules.description: Syncs the Game Rules with the client
extras: Essential Client is required to change the rules on the client

rules.name: infiniteItems
rules.description: This allows for survival players to have infinite blocks, food, and enderpearls

rules.name: maxChatLength
rules.description: Changes the max chat length limit, you need EssentialClient for this to work, setting this rule below 256 may cause issues

rules.name: minecartBoosting
rules.description: Reimplements minecart boosting

rules.name: phantomsObeyMobcaps
rules.description: Makes phantoms unable to spawn unless the mobcap allows for them to

rules.name: reloadFakePlayerActions
rules.description: Automatically reloads the fake players actions after server restart

rules.name: reloadFakePlayers
rules.description: Automatically respawns fake players on server restart

rules.name: removeItemEntitiesAfterThreshold
rules.description: Removes all item entities after set amount of item entities is reached in a world, set to 0 to disable

rules.name: removeWarnMismatchBlockPos
rules.description: Removes the warning 'Mismatch in destroy block pos...' in console and logs

rules.name: removeWarnOversizedChunk
rules.description: Removes the warning 'Saving oversized chunk...' in console and logs

rules.name: removeWarnRemovedEntity
rules.description: Removes the warning 'Fetching packet for removed entity...' in console and logs

rules.name: removeXpEntitiesAfterThreshold
rules.description: Removes all xp entities after set amount of xp entities is reached in a world, set to 0 to disable

rules.name: shulkerSception
rules.description: Allows you to put shulker boxes inside of other shulkers

rules.name: spectatorPotionNoCountdown
rules.description: Stops potion effects from ticking when in spectator

rules.name: stackableShulkerComparatorOverloadFix
rules.description: Fixes stacked shulkers overloading comparators

rules.name: stackableShulkersInPlayerInventories
rules.description: Shulker boxes stack in player inventories, this is not the same as `stackableShulkerBoxes` in Carpet. This will always allow you to stack shulkers in your inventory.
extras: Disable all other `stackableShulker` rules (unless you are using stackableShulkersWithItems)

rules.name: stackableShulkersWithItems
rules.description: Shulker boxes stack with items inside will stack with other shulkers with the same items
extras: This rule requires stackableShulkersInPlayerInventories to be enabled

rules.name: structureBlockKillEntities
rules.description: Kills all entities (bar players) within the structure bounding box when loading a structure
extras: Requires ignore entities to be set to false

rules.name: structureBlockReplaceFluids
rules.description: Replaces existing fluids when pasting. Why would you want to keep existing fluids anyways???
